an2.190-194:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing two qualities, one dwells in suffering. What two? (90) Anger and hostility … (9) Denigration and insolence … (92) Envy and miserliness … (93) Deceitfulness and craftiness … (94) Moral shamelessness and moral recklessness.Possessing these two qualities, one dwells in suffering."
